product_name: The North Face Oso Fleece Hoodie - Infant Boys'
long_description: With ultrasoft, high-pile fleece that kids and parents will love, The North Face Oso hoodie for infant boys combines the performance and style of the brand's iconic Denali jacket with a warm hood. Lightweight polyester fleece is silky soft, resists pilling and fading, packs easily and maintains its shape. The North Face Oso hoodie features tricot-lined pockets and reinforced shoulder panels that repel light precipitation.
short_description: With ultrasoft, high-pile fleece that kids and parents will love, The North Face Oso hoodie for infant boys combines the performance and style of the brand's iconic Denali jacket with a warm hood.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
